name: Otoph
description:
FOR GMTK Jam 2

A first person shooter without shooting

~chill out and take some pictures~

WASD to move
mouse to aim
Left click to take a pic
Right click to point camera
T and Y to change aperture
G and H to change focus distance
B and N to change focal length

I recommend playing in fullscreen so you don't accidentally click off of the window since the mouse doesn't lock into the game :/

Photos will save to the PHOTOS folder next to the game executable!
